entries: You've long wanted to join the adventurous Pathfinder Society.
You have taken up the dangerous life of an adventurer in hopes of earning a spot among the Pathfinders.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Society} skill and the {@skill Lore||Pathfinder Society Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Additional Lore} skill feat.
